memories.title: The Day Nikalit Rakag Pa Picture Sa Akoa Hahahaha
memories.description: Ambut ni kalit ramn kag pa picture sa akoa hahahahaha crush na jud ko nimo ani bahh Wahahhahahaha

memories.title: Our First Picture After Mag Confest
memories.location: How Ironic sa Grade 9 Classroom japun hahahhah
memories.description: I just felt so happy after this one like, dili nmn kayo ta sig storya ani na time hahahahaha superr fallen najud during this time hahahahah.

memories.title: Our First Adventure
memories.description: First time that I've been on a trip with your family, grabeng excitement and kulba ani time, this also the time na I officially ask you to be my girlfriend pero wala tayy pictureee wahhhh.

memories.title: First Samal Trip Together
memories.description: You and Me against the world wahahahaha, fighting for our fear, the first ever trip that will forever be cherished, balikan tani sunod nig maka adto natag switzerland hahhahahahaa.

memories.title: Our Little World
memories.description: It doesn't matter, every moment with you is a treasure, those pa kalit-kalit na lakaw, pa kalit-kalit na kaon, every time na I'm with you all of those moments is special and will forever be treasured.
